glosses: Used with postpositions like dek, değin, kadar, beri etc. to emphasize the beginning or the end of a thing with regards to time or distance.

examples.translation: He ran all the way to the coast.
I've been waiting for you here since 1.

examples.text: Sınavdan geçmek için ta gündoğumuna kadar ders çalıştı.
examples.translation: She studied till sunrise to pass the exam.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish تا (tā), from Persian تا (tâ, “up to, until”).
